I ran into the error message

"An error occurred while creating a message compose window. Please try again."

which lacks information on details.  A re-installaiton of Thunderbird solved that problem for me (though I don#t know why).  The error message could really use an improvement.  Thanks!

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Thunderbird
2. Click button "Write" to compose a new message (or click reply on an existing mail)

Actual Results:  
Error popup
"An error occurred while creating a message compose window. Please try again."

Expected Results:  
A mail composition window

comments.text:
no, the text in the exception is not very user friendly. This is the reason we have the error console, and reportError should be writing to the error console.

If we're getting an error loading the string from the string bundle, perhaps the install did get corrupted somehow, and re-installing fixed the breakage. But that's speculation...
